name: Walter Wet - local co-op
description:
Prototype of Walter Wet - the water droplet - a educational game about the water-cycle, for 3rd graders.

This game has around 10 levels (depending if playing solo or coop), demonstrating transitions between different water states.

Controls:

ARROW KEYS / WASD - control characters 
P -pause 
R -restart level
M -mainMenu

Dev day 8/14 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I am trying to figure out the design/mechanics for advanced concepts such as cloud formation / precipitation & the interactions with creatures & plants.

Feedback is welcome <3
